meetingLocation: We'll be meeting in the newer parking lot off Rockrimmon Drive.
description: Come join the Friends of Ute Valley Park to close and revegetate rogue trails along Beautiful Loop. Please wear long pants and closed-toe shoes, bring work gloves, sunscreen, water, snacks and you must wear SOMETHING TO ACT AS A MASK that covers your mouth and nose (bandanna, buff, etc.). Meet up location is at the HP Parking Lot. From there we will be dividing up into teams to accomplish our goals.
